params.externalCommand: CROSS_COMPILE=aarch64-linux-gnu- CROSS_COMPILE_ARM32=arm-linux-gnueabi- LLVM=1 LLVM_IAS=1 HOSTAR=llvm-ar HOSTAS=llvm-as HOSTCFLAGS="-O3 -march=native -flto=thin -mllvm=-polly -mllvm=-polly-vectorizer=stripmine -mllvm=-polly-omp-backend=LLVM -mllvm=-polly-parallel -mllvm=-polly-num-threads=0 -mllvm=-polly-scheduling=dynamic -fwhole-program-vtables -fforce-emit-vtables -fstrict-vtable-pointers" HOSTCXXFLAGS="${HOSTCFLAGS}" HOSTLDFLAGS="${HOSTCFLAGS} -fuse-ld=lld" KCFLAGS=-mcpu=cortex-a73
